subject: Golf
Phoenix Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson, who is dealing with a bad back, shot a par 71 in the Phoenix Open, 11 shots higher than his opening 60 in 2013.
snippet: Phil Mickelson, who is dealing with a bad back, shot a par 71 in the Phoenix Open, 11 shots higher than his opening 60 in 2013.
